nodes.text: The ScorSear 200 survival kit was a suit of adverse environment gear produced by the Pretormin Environmental company and sold for  500. The gear was available following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

The ScorSear 200 was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013. The full name of ScorSear 200 survival kit was given in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games a year later.
